11.ara-name: كتاب النكاح عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ar-Rubai bint Muawwidh said:"The morning after the consummation of my marriage, the Prophet came and sat on my bed as far from me as you are sitting now, and our little girls started beating the Duff and reciting verses mourning my father who had been killed in the battle of Badr. One of them said: 'Among us is a Prophet who knows what will happen tomorrow.' On that the Prophet said: 'Stop saying this, and keep on saying what you were saying before

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي إِعْلاَنِ النِّكَاحِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Publicizing The Marriage
